Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to certain real estate syndication offerings
Summary: Exempts certain timesharing plans involving ten or fewer purchasers from certain filing requirements relating to real estate investments; excludes New York City.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to certain real estate syndication offerings
